definition: to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: The test is simple and has a straightforward scoring system.
sentences.chinese: 这个测试是简单的，而且有一个简明易懂的计分系统。

sentences.english: Notice that this entry is exactly the opposite of the entry as uncollectible.
sentences.chinese: 注意这个会计分录恰好与核销坏账的分录相反。

sentences.english: Strategis is produced by Industry Canada a department of the Federal government which employs over 4,000 people across Canada.
sentences.chinese: 是一个联邦政府部门，提供统计分析和各国贸易指南。

sentences.english: It would not be easy, no question about that. But we have counting rules now.
sentences.chinese: 毋庸置疑，这并非易事，但我们现在已有了计分规则。

sentences.english: The first six problem sets are graded.
Each dimension has its own set of metrics, together with its scoring components.
sentences.chinese: 每个维度有其自己的量度集，以及其计分组件。

sentences.english: The electronic scoreboard is essential for stadiums and gymnasiums.
sentences.chinese: 电子计分牌是体育场馆中不可缺少的重要设备。

sentences.english: No educated guesses' about what to do or chart reading.
sentences.chinese: 没有故弄玄虚的猜测和图表统计分析。

sentences.english: Adopt the complete case in data proceed statistics analysis.
sentences.chinese: 采用资料完整的病例进行统计分析。

sentences.english: It was a matter meta-analysis, a study of studies.
sentences.chinese: 这是一项通过反复实验统计分析的研究发放。

sentences.english: To familiarize students with further conception of Statistics. 2. To familiarize students with application of Statistic theory and practice.
sentences.chinese: 培养学生了解统计分析实务在资管领域之应用与分析。

sentences.english: No late homework will be graded.
The third part employs statistic analysis and quality study.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分采用统计分析和质的研究法。

sentences.english: At same time, RSW quality judgment and classification can be implemented using statistic analysis.
sentences.chinese: 进而利用统计分析可以实现点焊质量判定与分类。

sentences.english: Statistical analysis for continuous data was done by weighted mean difference or standardised mean difference.
sentences.chinese: 连续数据以权重平均差或标准化平均差作统计分析。

sentences.english: It includes a simple score statistic.
sentences.chinese: 包括一个简单的计分表。

definition: to deduct marks (when grading school work)/to have marks deducted/penalty points/to lose points for a penalty or error
integral (calculus)/accumulated points (in sports, at school etc)/total credits earned by student/bonus points in a benefit scheme
to examine/to check up on/to assess/to review/appraisal/review/evaluation
